articles.title: Senate approves bill to make Juneteenth a federal holiday - Associated Press
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — The Senate passed a bill Tuesday that would make Juneteenth, or June 19th, a federal holiday commemorating the end of slavery in the United States. The bill would lead to Juneteenth becoming the 12th federal holiday.
